sentence.Network_en: We unreasonably expect near perfect behaviour from our children.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们很不理智地期待我们的孩子有近乎完美的表现。

sentence.Network_en: The banks' charges are unreasonably high.
sentence.Network_cn: 银行收取的费用高得离谱。

sentence.Network_en: He was also petty, unreasonably querulous, and mean.
sentence.Network_cn: 他还是个气量狭窄, 无事生非, 平庸刻薄的人.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(U2) ... unreasonableness 无理性 unreasonably 不合理地 unreasoning 无理智的.

this Agreement may not be assigned in whole or in part by either party without first obtaining the written consent of the other party which will not be unreasonably withheld .这协议没有首先获得将不不合理地被扣留的另一个宴会的书面同意可能不在任一宴会旁边的全部或者部份中被分配。
an object of unreasonably excessive attention or reverence ., 无理由的给某物过多的注意或崇敬.

list.abs: 01的大... ... 玩火的女孩 Flickan som lekte med elden 不合理的行为 Unreasonable Behaviour **陌生的土地 Unaccustomed Earth.
你在申请离婚时，你的丈夫或许会对你以他不合理行为（unreasonable behaviour）为由提出离婚而向法庭抗辩；然而，若你能在法庭 …
沪江博客 - 英语学习资料 2007 -... ... 乱收费 unreasonable service;go-as-you-pay 量入为出 pay-as-you-go.
unprecedented sales 空前销售unreasonable prices 不合理价格unskilled labor 不熟练工人
Are you making unreasonable demands on yourself ?, 你是否对自己有不合理的要求?

entry.def: If you say that someone is being unreasonable, you mean that they are behaving in a way that is not fair or sensible.

example.ex: The strikers were being unreasonable in their demands, having rejected the deal two weeks ago...
example.tran: 罢工者的要求很不合理，他们在两周前已拒绝接受这份协议。

example.ex: It was her unreasonable behaviour with a Texan playboy which broke up her marriage...
example.tran: 与一个得克萨斯的花花公子的不正当关系导致她的婚姻破裂。

entry.def: An unreasonable decision, action, price, or amount seems unfair and difficult to justify.

example.ex: ...unreasonable increases in the price of petrol...
One in four consumers now say water prices are very unreasonable.
example.tran: 1/4的消费者认为现在的水费很不合理。

means.word_mean: 1. not in a reasonable or intelligent manner;

sentences.sentence: "she reacted unreasonably when she learned she had failed"

means.word_mean: 2. to a degree that exceeds the bounds or reason or moderation;

auth_sentence.content: Rules prevent charity members from profiteering unreasonably.
auth_sentence.res_content: Rules prevent charity members from profiteering unreasonably.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Rules prevent charity members from profiteering unreasonably.

auth_sentence.content: "This is my house," she says, not unreasonably.
auth_sentence.res_content: "This is my house," she says, not unreasonably.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: "This is my house," she says, not unreasonably.

auth_sentence.content: We learn that Wagoner is perhaps unreasonably partisan toward his own company.
auth_sentence.res_content: We learn that Wagoner is perhaps unreasonably partisan toward his own company.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We learn that Wagoner is perhaps unreasonably partisan toward his own company.
